1: Ri c'ojolaxel ri ajno'j cuc'amowaj ri u pixbenic ri u tat; ri banal nimal man cuya' ta u xiquin che ri k'ilonic.
2: Chquijujunal caquiyac na ri u wächinic ri caquibij, e are' tak c'ut ri jachinelab ri quieb qui wäch quenum che u banic ri tokinic.
3: Ri qui chajixic tak ri tzij are wa' ri u chajixic kib chi kib; ri sibalaj cätzijtzotic xa u tuquiel cäretzelaj rib.
4: Ri sak'or cärayinic man cärikon ta c'ut; ri cächacunic, queq'uiy ri jastak rech.
5: Ri suc'alaj winak itzel caril ri banoj tzij; ri banal etzelal ya'l q'uixbal xukuje' yok'obal.
6: Ri colomal cuto' ri winak ri man c'o ta u bach'uyal; ri jech'balil cusachisaj u wäch ri ajmac.
7: E c'o jachin tak ri man c'o ta cäc'am chque cäquiban c'u quib chi e k'inomab, e c'o c'u jachin tak c'o ronojel cuc' cäquiban c'u quib chi e mebayib.
8: Ri cäto'tajisan ri u c'aslemal ri k'inom are' ri u k'inomal; ri meba' mawi jumul quebuta' xibin tak ib.
9: Ri e suc' xak e junam ruc' ri chäj ri cänicowic; ri e banal tak etzelal, xak e junam ruc' ri chäj ri cachupic.
10: Ri banoj nimal xuwi cuc'am ulok ch'o'j; ri no'j c'o cuc' ri caquimach' quib.
11: Ri k'inomal ri xak c'ätetal xq'uiyic cäbe pa rij; are c'u ri xak nojimal camulixic, cuq'uiyirisaj.
12: Eyebal c'uxaj man je ta quelic, anima'aj c'axc'obinak, are c'u ri rayinic ri tz'akatinak xak junam ruc' juwi' che' re c'aslemal.
13: Ri man nim ta cäril wi jun takanic, cubisoj na; ri nim cäril wi ri takanic, cäya' na tojbal rech.
14: Ri u tijonic ri ajno'j bulbux wa' re c'aslemal, man caban ta kajem chupam ri e u colob ri cämical,
15: Ri utzalaj no'jinic cuch'äc ri u ya'ic u k'ij, ri e jachinelab ri quieb qui wäch benam que pa ri sachbal qui wäch.
16: Ri utz cachomanic ronojel cuban ruc' c'oxomanic, are' c'u ri man c'o ta u no'j cuya' u k'ij chi man c'o ta u no'j.
17: Ri itzel tako'n quebuc'am ulok u q'ueyowal, are' c'u ri jicalaj tako'n cutzirisanic.
18: Mebayil, q'uixbalil ri man nim ta caril wi ri yo'w no'j; sibalaj cäya' u k'ij ri nim cäril wi ri pixbenic.
19: Ri rayibal ri cätz'akatic cuya' quicotemal. Ri man c'o ta qui no'j man caquik'i' taj we caquinajtajisaj quib che ri lawaloyil.
20: Chawuc'aj awib cuc' ri ajno'jab cärik c'u na a no'j chawuc'aj awib cuc' ri man c'o ta qui no'j caquisachisaj c'u na a wäch.
21: Ri ajmaquib man quetzokopix ta rumal ri lawaloyil; ri e suc', utzil ri tojbal que cäya'ic.
22: Ri utzalaj winak cuya' can quechbal ri e ri' tak u mam; ri ajmac quebumulij utzalaj tak jastak ri cux na rech ri suc'.
23: Pa ri rulew ri meba' tz'ebem ri cätijic, sibalaj c'u q'ui ri cäsach u wäch jawije' ri man c'o ta wi suq'uilal.
24: Ri man cujic' taj ri u c'ojol xa man u lok' taj; jachin c'ut ri lok'caril ri u c'ojol cujic'o.
25: Ri suc', cäwa'ic c'ä quil na ri u numic, are' c'u ri banal etzelal cäcanaj ruc' numic.
